keyword: how many calories in a guinness pint
title: How Many Calories in a Guinness Pint?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a guinness pint, including carbs, protein, sodium, and equivalents for this popular stout beer.
h1: How Many Calories in a Guinness Pint?
assumptions: Standard Guinness Draught stout, 4.2% ABV, 568 ml imperial pint, unpasteurized, no added sugars.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, serving size, temperature, and exact recipe. Check labels or brewery info when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard pint of Guinness provides about 210 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Guinness Extra Stout (6% ABV, higher carbs)

faqs.q: How many calories in a guinness pint?
faqs.a: Approximately 210 kcal for a standard 568 ml pint.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Guinness pint?
faqs.a: About 18 g of carbohydrates, with no fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Is Guinness low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g fat and only 2 g protein per pint.

faqs.q: How does Guinness compare to other beers calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to many lagers at 200-250 kcal per pint, but lower carbs due to its stout style.

faqs.q: Does the alcohol content affect calories in Guinness?
faqs.a: At 4.2% ABV, alcohol contributes about 100 kcal; the rest from carbs.
